thread.title: JetBlue Selects Developer for Proposed JFK Expansion

author: Paul Berger
title: JetBlue Selects Developer for Proposed JFK Expansion

organizations.name: jetblue selects developer for proposed jfk expansion jetblue airways corp.

text:
JetBlue Airways Corp. has selected Vantage Airport Group and RXR Realty LLC to lead its proposed multibillion-dollar terminal expansion at John F. Kennedy International Airport.
JetBlueâ€™s planned expansion, estimated to cost between $2 billion and $3 billion depending upon the final design, is intended to add gates that can accommodate modern, wide-body planes.
